name: part_002
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕LIVE2023】3rd Generation Girls Band !!!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [AqEqeiqskEI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Pekora Usada and Marine Houshou perform the song 'Sweet Time' as part of the 3rd Generation girls band.
The 3rd Generation girls band performs 'God knows...'. Marine Houshou is on lead vocals and guitar.

subtitles.english: A casual smile, passing you on the street, Oh-Oh-Baby
